Activated successfully to WMC using free key from M$.

No pic = HOAX, so here it is:
http://i627.photobucket.com/albums/tt359/Shadow_Nexus_Album/SS_win8.png

* Steps:
- After finished installing windows try to activate using SCYPT activator 1.4.1 (run it as administrator).
- If the key is blacklisted, just hit the "Uninstall product key". Don't restart, just click activate button again.
- If that doesn't work, search win 8 pro keys anywhere you could find on internet, then install it using "SLMGR /ipk " command (again, as administrator).
- Don't restart, just click activate button. If windows got activated, then you can restart now.
- Restart.
- Connect to internet, windows will activated automatically & you'll have any personalization settings unlocked.
- Add WMC feature, insert your free WMC key from M$.
- After entering the key & setup started, if you have a blazing fast internet connection, leave it connected. Otherwise, turn it off.
- Restart.
- Connect to internet & your windows 8 pro + wmc will automatically activated.
- DONE!


Thank you MURPHY78, keep up the good work.. :)
